attributes.title: Spam
attributes.review: This app made my entire phone crash and made a bunch of stupid conservatives attack me. Trump has designed a crazy fandom if that’s what I should call it and this app is a cult full of stupid racist people.

attributes.title: no✨❤️
attributes.review: lemme tell you that this app is horrible✨there is no need for an app just for our 💫🧚🏽‍♀️orange💫💕 president🙂 we can just look it up online and find what we need to find 👍🏽. this app makes no sense whatsoever 💅🏽 whoever made this app🤩 delete it please🤪💫 but anyways this was just a bad app to begin with and idk why someone made an app just for people to delete it 😂. okay thats all i wanted to say bye now !!💕

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: I get this app is supposed to be a political campaign, BÜÂÉHÊÈSŚ it’s really just an app about this orange guy. Like I went on this app and I was just like sis, no I gotta go take my caterpillar for a walk luv. So yeah, ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆

attributes.title: This makes me 🤮 Disappointment!
attributes.review: This is to much to ask this is half of our life and you’re just taking it away no!

attributes.title: spam/selling info
attributes.review: this app would not stop sending me notifications abt trump 2020. even after i turned off notifications, the app still kept sending them to me. not to mention, i am more than positive this app is selling our data to trumps business partners cuz the second i downloaded this app i got hundreds of targeted trump 2020 ads. all in all, don’t get this app it is a bad idea

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This app is literally horrible, I downloaded it thinking this was a clown arcade game due to trump... you know... being a clown🙃 but it’s not! It’s all political bullsh*t with the worst president in history of the US! I need my money back!

attributes.title: i swallowed my grandma because of this
attributes.review: PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD! i was watching a leaf eat a car while with my grandma, and i decided to download this app. as soon as i downloaded this app, it opened a porthole that made me swallow my beloved grandma. please do not download

attributes.title: I wish i could give 0 stars 😩
attributes.review: I wanted to keep up with trump so i downloaded this app. it gave me so many viruses and i got doxxed! people have showed up at my doorstep because this and im getting harassed😿😿

attributes.title: Zero Stars If I Could!!!
attributes.review: It took 2 weeks to download and when it finished the secret service showed up to my house and demanded that I vote for Trump. They threatened to steal my dog and paint Trumps face on my lawn when I told them I wouldn’t.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app is so terribly designed. The first image I see is of this terrifying life size cheetoh. Disgusting. I can’t believe this would be on the App Store where children are able to find it
